radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild asymmetry of the thyroid; no pathologically enlarged mediastinal, hilar, or axillary lymph nodes; lungs are clear; no pleural or pericardial fluid or pneumothorax; no pulmonary nodules seen.

Numerous ill-defined hypodense lesions within the liver; small hypodensity in the right kidney likely a cyst; gallstones demonstrated; normal stomach and bowel; no abdominal pathologic lymphadenopathy, free air, or free fluid; sutures seen in the right lower quadrant; apparent seroma in the midline.
